eventScripts.script:
OEE_ProdOff = system.tag.read("[.]PS_Planner").value			
	
	if OEE_ProdOff != 0:
		# If OEE_ProdOff is not 0, reset certain tags
		system.tag.write("[.]../Count/OEE_On", 0)
		#system.tag.write("[default]Tags/OEE/Enterprise/BG4/Plant1/Line1/Machine1/Operating_time/TST", 0)
	elif OEE_ProdOff == 0:
		# If OEE_ProdOff is 0, update certain tags
		system.tag.write("[.]../Count/OEE_On", 1)

eventScripts.script:
if currentValue.value == 1:
		tags_to_read = [
			"[.]../../../../../../Business_Code",
			"[.]../../../../../../Business_Name",
			"[.]../../../../../Plant_Code",
			"[.]../../../../../Plant_Name",
			"[.]../../../../Cell_Code",
			"[.]../../../../Cell_Name",
			"[.]../../../Line_Code",
			"[.]../../../Line_Name",
			"[.]../../Machine_Code",
			"[.]../../Machine_Name",
			"[.]../../../../../Shift",
			"[.]../../../../../Shift_Hour",
			"[.]../../../../../DateTime_OEE",
			"[.]../Count/OEE_On",
			"[.]../Operating_Time/MC_Status_Act",
			"[.]../../OPC/From/Operator_Id",
			"[.]../../../../../../../Hour",
			"[.]../../../../../../../Date_hour",
			"[.]../../OPC/From/Part_Id",
			"[.]../OEE/OEE_Start",
			"[.]../../../../../DateTime_OEE",
			"[.]../Operating_Time/Stop_Timer",
			"[.]../Operating_Time/Run_Timer",
			"[.]../Operating_Time/Off_Timer",
			"[.]../Count/G_Count",
			"[.]../Count/R_Count",
			"[.]Breakdown_ID",
			"[.]../Operating_Time/Idle_Timer",
			"[.]../Operating_Time/Shift_Time",
			"[.]../OEE/CT",
			"[.]../Count/CT_E",
			"[.]../Count/CT_H",
			"[.]../Count/CT_L",
			"[.]../Operating_Time/HT_Time",
			"[.]../Operating_Time/MC_Time"
		]
		# Call the function
		result_values = OEE.OEE_Triggers.log_oee_data_15Min(tags_to_read)
		
		# If the function returned valid data, write to tags
		if result_values:
			reset_tags = [
				"[.]../OEE/OEE_Start",
				"[.]../Count/G_Count",
				"[.]../Count/R_Count",
				"[.]../Operating_Time/Run_Timer",
				"[.]../Operating_Time/Stop_Timer",
				"[.]../Operating_Time/Idle_Timer",
				"[.]../Count/CT_E",
				"[.]../Count/CT_H",
				"[.]../Count/CT_L",
				"[.]../Operating_Time/HT_Time",
				"[.]../Operating_Time/MC_Time",
				"[.]../Operating_Time/Off_Timer",
				"[.]../Operating_Time/Shift_Time",
				"[.]../../OPC/To/Availability",
				"[.]../../OPC/To/Quality",
				"[.]../../OPC/To/Performance",
				"[.]../../OPC/To/OEE"           
			]
			
			system.tag.writeBlocking(reset_tags, result_values)

tags.query:
select isnull ((
SELECT 
CASE 
WHEN {[.]../../../../../Shift_Id} = 1 THEN shift_1 
WHEN {[.]../../../../../Shift_Id} = 2 THEN shift_2 
WHEN {[.]../../../../../Shift_Id} = 3 THEN shift_3 
END AS Shift_Status FROM [OEE_NEW].[dbo].[PRODUCTION_OFF_SCHEDULE] 
WHERE business_id = 5000
AND plant_id = 5000
AND cell_id = {[.]../../../../Cell_Code} 
AND line_id = {[.]../../../Line_Code} 
AND machine_code = {[.]../../Machine_Code} 
AND CAST(date_scheduled AS DATE) = '{[.]../../../../../DateTime_OEE}'
), 0)
tags.name: PS_Planner

tags.query: Select isnull((Select distinct shift_id from [MASTER_DATA].[dbo].[M_SHIFT] where business_id = 5000 and plant_id = 5000 and shift_start_time < '{[.]../../../../../../../Time 2}' and shift_end_time > '{[.]../../../../../../../Time 2}'),'3')
tags.name: PS

SELECT business_id as BG_ID, business_name as BG_Name FROM M_BUSINESS
order by business_id
tags.name: BG

tags.query:
SELECT business_id as Business_ID , plant_id as Plant_ID , plant_name as Plant_Name FROM M_PLANT
order by plant_id
tags.name: Plant

eventScripts.script:
if currentValue.value == True:
	    from java.util import Calendar
	
	    # Get the current minute from the system clock
	    minute_now = system.date.now().getMinutes()
	
	    # If it's a multiple of 5 (like 0, 5, 10, ..., 55), set to 1, else 0
	    new_value = 1 if (minute_now % 5 == 0) else 0
	
	    system.tag.write("[default]EMS/EMS/LMCI/Plant-2/DC_850T-1/Minute Trigger", new_value)

# Tags you are actually reading in Gateway
	tags_to_read = [
		"[.]../../../../../DateTime",
		"[.]../../../../../../Business_Code",
		"[.]../../../../../Plant_Code",
		"[.]../../../../Cell_Code",
		"[.]../../../Line_Code",
		"[.]../../Machine_ID",
		"[.]../../Machine_Code",
		"[.]../../../../../Date",
		"[.]../../../../../Shift",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/Current-R",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/Current-Y",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/Current-B",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/CurrentTotal",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/Frequency",   #  frequency is NOT NULL in EMS_Test_Data
		"[.]../../OPC/From/KWH",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/PF",
		"[.]../../../../../../../Hour",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-Avg",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-B",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-R",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-Y",
		"[.]../../OPC/From/WH",
		"[.]../../../../../DateTime"
	]
	
	# Read tag values
	tag_values = [tag.value if tag.value is not None else None for tag in system.tag.readBlocking(tags_to_read)]
	
	# Call project script
	EMS_Overall.TestFunction.EMS_trigger(tag_values)

if currentValue.value == True:
	    from java.util import Calendar
	
	    # Get the current minute from the system clock
	    minute_now = system.date.now().getMinutes()
	
	    # If it's a multiple of 5 (like 0, 5, 10, ..., 55), set to 1, else 0
	    new_value = 1 if (minute_now % 5 == 0) else 0
	
	    system.tag.write("[default]EMS/EMS/LMCI/Plant-2/DC_850T-1/Minute Trigger", new_value)

tags_to_read = [
	     "[.]../../../../../DateTime",
		 "[.]../../../../../../Business_Code",
		 "[.]../../../../../../Business_Name",		
        "[.]../../../../../Plant_Code",
        "[.]../../../../../Plant_Name",
        "[.]../../../../Cell_Code",
        "[.]../../../../Cell_Name",
        "[.]../../Machine_ID",
        "[.]../../Machine_Name",
        "[.]../../Machine_Code",
        "[.]../../../../../Date",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-B",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-R",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-Y",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/CurrentTotal",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/Frequency",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/KWH",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/PF",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-Avg",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-B",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-R",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-Y",
	    "[.]../../OPC/From/WH",
	    "[.]../../../../../Shift",	    	    	   
	]
	tag_values = [tag.value if tag.value is not None else '' for tag in system.tag.readBlocking(tags_to_read)]
	
	EMS_Overall.Log_Function.EMS_trigger(tag_values, 'Cell')

M_Tracking=system.tag.read("[.]../../Machine_Tracking").value
	if M_Tracking==1:
		tags_to_read = [
		     "[.]../../../../../DateTime",
			 "[.]../../../../../../Business_Code",		
	        "[.]../../../../../Plant_Code",
	        "[.]../../../../Cell_Code",
	        "[.]../../../Line_Code",
	        "[.]../../Machine_ID",
	        "[.]../../Machine_Code",
	        "[.]../../../../../Date",
	        "[.]../../../../../Shift",	
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-B",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-R",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-Y",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current_Avg",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Frequency",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/KWH",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/PF",
		    "[.]../Expression/Voltage_Avg",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-B",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-R",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-Y",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/WH",
		        	    	   
		]
		tag_values = [tag.value if tag.value is not None else '' for tag in system.tag.readBlocking(tags_to_read)]
		
		EMS_Overall.TestFunction.EMS_trigger(tag_values)

M_Tracking=system.tag.read("[.]../../Machine_Tracking").value
	if M_Tracking==1:
		tags_to_read = [
		     "[.]../../../../../DateTime",
			 "[.]../../../../../../Business_Code",		
	        "[.]../../../../../Plant_Code",
	        "[.]../../../../Cell_Code",
	        "[.]../../../Line_Code",
	        "[.]../../Machine_ID",
	        "[.]../../Machine_Code",
	        "[.]../../../../../Date",
	        "[.]../../../../../Shift",	
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-B",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-R",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current-Y",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Current_Avg",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Frequency",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/KWH",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/PF",
		    "[.]../Expression/Voltage_Avg",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-B",
		    "[.]../../OPC/From/Volt-R",

if currentValue.value == True:
	    from java.util import Calendar
	
	    # Get the current minute from the system clock
	    minute_now = system.date.now().getMinutes()
	
	    # If it's a multiple of 5 (like 0, 5, 10, ..., 55), set to 1, else 0
	    new_value = 1 if (minute_now % 5 == 0) else 0
	
	    system.tag.write("[default]EMS/EMS/LMCI/Plant-2/DC_850T-1/Minute Trigger", new_value)
